snippet: The military stepped back from its plan after colleges pushed to keep a door open to rural students and will instead place the programs on “probationary status.”
abstract: Army tells 13 universities it will step back from plan to shutter their Reserve Officers' Training Corps programs, disrupting strategy that has been promoted as effort to refocus military's recruiting amid demographic shifts.
lead_paragraph: The military stepped back from its plan after colleges pushed to keep a door open to rural students and will instead place the programs on “probationary status.”

headline.main: Army Suspends R.O.T.C. Closings at 13 Universities
headline.print_headline: Army Suspends R.O.T.C. Closings at 13 Universities

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
